name: Invisible power can make invisible, can the invisible power make invisible?
description: On June 11, 2021, Fundação Palmares, the arm of the Brazilian government dedicated to the preservation of black culture in the country, released the document Retrato de Acervo 01, a report accusing years of Marxist appropriation of the institution transfigured in its works. Since 1500 the black population has been objectified in a mode of violent exploitation to which historical and institutional erasure is relegated to them. This work is a warning against the invisible power of the state, which aims to contain even the right of rebellion against the dominant thought. PDF, 74p., edition of institutional book.
